meaningMnemonic: Someone takes your <kanji>hand</kanji> and shows you how to <kanji>continue</kanji>. "This is the <vocabulary>procedure</vocabulary>," they say. Move your hand like this. Verrrryyy goood. Good procedure. Good!
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi vocab readings of 手 and 続く put together into one. Darn these body parts making everything kun'yomi.
